short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Volume control within a browser tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Volume: Take Control of Your Tab's Audio
Adjust and boost the volume of individual browser tabs effortlessly with Tab Volume. Perfect for streaming, music, or online meetings, this extension gives you the power to customize your sound experience for each tab.

Key Features:
Per-Tab Volume Control: Manage the sound of each tab independently.
Volume Boost: Increase audio levels beyond the default limits for a richer experience.
Simple and Intuitive Design: Easy-to-use interface with a responsive volume slider.
Customizable Sound Settings: Fine-tune audio to suit your preferences.
Compatible Across Platforms: Works seamlessly with YouTube, Spotify, Netflix, and more.
Why Use Tab Volume?
Whether you're multitasking or need an extra sound boost, Tab Volume provides a tailored and enhanced listening experience for every tab.

Download Tab Volume today and enjoy precise audio control!
